concept.title: Requirements for Web Service Calls to

section.p: provides Web services (platform services) that can be called by other systems, such as an external process control. In this scenario, is the HTTPS server while the other system is a Web service client. The following requirements must be met to establish a connection to :

ul.li: The server must present a valid certificate: The CN (common name) must correspond to the server's domain name and it must be valid at the time of calling.
The clients must trust the server certificate for SSL connections: The clients' truststore must contain the server certificate.
In case of certificate-based authentication, must trust the client's certificate: The truststore must contain a certificate with a valid signing chain to the certificate presented by the client.
